headline: A Look At W. R. Berkley (WRB) Valuation After Recent 90 Day Share Price Pullback
summary: Recent return profile and business scale W. R. Berkley (WRB) has seen mixed share-price moves recently, with a 1 day return of 1.08% and a 7 day return of 2.02%, while the past 3 months show a 10.81% decline. Over longer horizons, the stock shows a 1 year total return of 24.46%, a 3 year total return of 54.29% and a 5 year total return of 164.92%. The last close was US$69.36. The company reports annual revenue of US$14.65b and net income of US$1.91b, reflecting a sizeable footprint across its...
